text: allow-failure は matrix に対して指定できないと意味ないよね

attachments.fallback: GitHub: Please support something like "allow-failure" for a given job · Issue #399 · actions/toolkit
attachments.title: Please support something like "allow-failure" for a given job · Issue #399 · actions/toolkit
attachments.text: We use github actions in our &quot;snapd&quot; project and we love them. One small feature we would love to see is a way to mark a test job as &quot;allow-failure&quot; (or a term along these lines...
